longBusinessSummary: Anant Raj Limited is primarily engaged in the real estate and infrastructure development business in India. It develops and constructs residential townships, group housings, commercial developments, information and technology parks, malls, office complexes, affordable housings, data centres, hospitality, and serviced apartments. The company was formerly known as Anant Raj Industries Limited and changed its name to Anant Raj Limited in October 2012. Anant Raj Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
